verses.text: <a href="../2-Timothy-3-1/" title="2 Timothy 3:1 KJV verse detail"><span id="3" class="versehover">1  "JESUS_END"This know also, that in the last days perilous times shall come.

<a href="../2-Timothy-3-2/" title="2 Timothy 3:2 KJV verse detail"><span id="4" class="versehover">2  "JESUS_END"For men shall be lovers of their own selves, covetous, boasters, proud, blasphemers, disobedient to parents, unthankful, unholy,

<a href="../2-Timothy-3-3/" title="2 Timothy 3:3 KJV verse detail"><span id="5" class="versehover">3  "JESUS_END"Without natural affection, trucebreakers, false accusers, incontinent, fierce, despisers of those that are good,
<a href="../2-Timothy-3-4/" title="2 Timothy 3:4 KJV verse detail"><span id="6" class="versehover">4  "JESUS_END"Traitors, heady, highminded, lovers of pleasures more than lovers of God;
<a href="../2-Timothy-3-5/" title="2 Timothy 3:5 KJV verse detail"><span id="7" class="versehover">5  "JESUS_END"Having a form of godliness, but denying the power thereof: from such turn away.

<a href="../2-Timothy-3-6/" title="2 Timothy 3:6 KJV verse detail"><span id="8" class="versehover">6  "JESUS_END"For of this sort are they which creep into houses, and lead captive silly women laden with sins, led away with divers lusts,
<a href="../2-Timothy-3-7/" title="2 Timothy 3:7 KJV verse detail"><span id="9" class="versehover">7  "JESUS_END"Ever learning, and never able to come to the knowledge of the truth.

<a href="../2-Timothy-3-8/" title="2 Timothy 3:8 KJV verse detail"><span id="10" class="versehover">8  "JESUS_END"Now as Jannes and Jambres withstood Moses, so do these also resist the truth: men of corrupt minds, reprobate concerning the faith.
9 "JESUS_END"But they shall proceed no further: for their folly shall be manifest unto all men, as theirs also was.

<a href="../2-Timothy-3-10/" title="2 Timothy 3:10 KJV verse detail"><span id="12" class="versehover">10  "JESUS_END"But thou hast fully known my doctrine, manner of life, purpose, faith, longsuffering, charity, patience,
11 "JESUS_END"Persecutions, afflictions, which came unto me at Antioch, at Iconium, at Lystra; what persecutions I endured: but out of them all the Lord delivered me.
<a href="../2-Timothy-3-12/" title="2 Timothy 3:12 KJV verse detail"><span id="14" class="versehover">12  "JESUS_END"Yea, and all that will live godly in Christ Jesus shall suffer persecution.

<a href="../2-Timothy-3-13/" title="2 Timothy 3:13 KJV verse detail"><span id="15" class="versehover">13  "JESUS_END"But evil men and seducers shall wax worse and worse, deceiving, and being deceived.
14 "JESUS_END"But continue thou in the things which thou hast learned and hast been assured of, knowing of whom thou hast learned them;

<a href="../2-Timothy-3-15/" title="2 Timothy 3:15 KJV verse detail"><span id="17" class="versehover">15  "JESUS_END"And that from a child thou hast known the holy scriptures, which are able to make thee wise unto salvation through faith which is in Christ Jesus.
16 "JESUS_END"All scripture is given by inspiration of God, and is profitable for doctrine, for reproof, for correction, for instruction in righteousness:
<a href="../2-Timothy-3-17/" title="2 Timothy 3:17 KJV verse detail"><span id="19" class="versehover">17  "JESUS_END"That the man of God may be perfect, throughly furnished unto all good works.
